abstract.t: This document defines TLVs (type-length-value) structures forrepresenting cost values using the generalized MANET packet/messageformat. A message block TLV structure is defined for representing acost value associated with the local node. An address block TLVstructure is defined for representing a cost value associated withlinks or a cost value associated with other nodes. Both TLVstructures are defined for use within MANET protocols.Registry space is created for TLVs which follow this format.
